Since then, I've been learning, building, and growing — teaching myself Python, full-stack web development, and building real-world applications that aim to make a difference. Today, I'm crafting solutions at the intersection of healthcare and technology — one project at a time. I believe that coding is not just a skill, it's a superpower for creating impact
